seo.title: My CV {'|'} César Ibarra - FrontEnd Developer

intro.summary: Adaptable and technology-driven software developer with experience in frontend and fullstack development. Specialist in SCRUM, intuitive interfaces, and UX optimization. Analytical and problem-solving oriented, focused on creating innovative and efficient solutions for digital development.

about.title: Summary
about.text: I am a senior frontend developer with extensive experience in technologies such as Vue.js, React, Nuxt.js, and Tailwind CSS, as well as fullstack development using TypeScript, GraphQL, and Laravel. My professional career has been focused on creating intuitive and optimized interfaces, implementing automated testing with Cypress, Vitest, and Jest, and adopting agile methodologies like SCRUM to ensure efficiency in software development.
about.skills: I am known for being an analytical, adaptable person with a strong passion for teaching, teamwork, and problem-solving. My goal is to continue growing in the field of technological development, providing innovative and efficient solutions that contribute to the success of the projects I participate in.

topfluenz.description: Development and implementation of UX/UI interfaces based on Figma using Vue.js, Vite, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Integration of GraphQL APIs with Vue Apollo and automated testing with Cypress and Vitest. Creation of Landing Pages in Nuxt 3 and work in agile environments using SCRUM.

premo.description: Led a team of 3 developers, participated in migrating a monolithic project to an MVC, and designed a custom core for component and code reuse. Technologies: Nuxt 3, TypeScript, Pinia, Cypress, Vitest, Nitro, Fetch API, Tailwind CSS, Vite.

devsalsa.description: Development of a multilingual UGC content platform, improvements to the main website to ensure compatibility across all browsers. Technologies: Vue, Pinia, Tailwind CSS, Cypress, Vitest, Vite, Astro.

education.title: Education
education.career: Master’s in Full Stack Web Development

technicalSkills.title: Self-learning
technicalSkills.description: Ability to acquire new knowledge independently, adapting to technological and methodological changes.

communicationSkills.title: Effective Communication Skills
communicationSkills.description: Ability to convey ideas clearly and concisely.

entrepreneurialSpirit.title: Leadership
entrepreneurialSpirit.description: Ability to motivate, organize, and guide teams toward achieving objectives with efficiency and commitment.

teamWork.title: Teamwork
teamWork.description: Ability to collaborate effectively with different professional profiles, fostering an environment of cooperation and communication.

problemSolving.title: Problem-solving
problemSolving.description: Ability to identify and resolve issues effectively using agile methodologies and problem-solving techniques.

knowledgeTransfer.title: Passion for Teaching
knowledgeTransfer.description: Enthusiasm for sharing knowledge, training others, and fostering professional development within a team or community.
